metadata.synopsis: One liner for the human female farmer in the Eastway Food Crisis situation.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the female human farmer in the Eastway Food Crisis situation nearby Basilisk Gate.

0.speaker: Asparagus Mhallie
0.text: Oh, it's you! Please - do you think you could stop this? Surely they can't just take everything we have...
0.context: NodeContext: Pleased to see the player/hoping they can help

1.speaker: Asparagus Mhallie
1.text: My herd are dairy goats. I bet they're going to slaughter them, the poor things.

2.speaker: Asparagus Mhallie
2.text: I don't want to end up in the Gazette as your latest victim - please leave me alone.
2.context: NodeContext: Upset/stressed and trying to get out of the conversation

3.speaker: Asparagus Mhallie
3.text: I should have set my girls free before coming here. I know they're just goats, but I love them like family.
3.context: NodeContext: Upset but also a little angry at herself

4.speaker: Asparagus Mhallie
4.text: I'm sorry, I don't have time to get involved in gossip - I need to stop them from taking my goats.
4.context: NodeContext: Upset/stressed and trying to get out of the conversation

5.speaker: Asparagus Mhallie
5.text: If you save my herd, I could even name a goat after you! If you want, of course. Goats are very intelligent animals.
5.context: NodeContext: Means this as a compliment/good thing to try and get the player to help them
